mapper.select: SELECT RIGHT(w.warehouseCode,3) AS warehouseCode ,w.warehouseName ,w.category1 ,w.category2 ,w.`area` ,w.location ,w.outPlace ,w.currentWeight ,w.maxWeight ,w.weightPer ,w.`status` ,w.regDate ,w.updateDate FROM k1_view_warehouse_info AS w WHERE w.warehouseCode = CONCAT('warehouseCode_',#{warehouseCode});

SELECT RIGHT(s.inventoryCode,3) AS inventoryCode ,RIGHT(s.itemCode,3) AS itemCode ,s.itemName ,s.itemType ,s.itemCount ,s.totalPrice ,s.`status` ,s.`comment` FROM k1_view_stock AS s WHERE s.warehouseCode = CONCAT('warehouseCode_',#{warehouseCode}) ORDER BY s.inventoryCode ASC LIMIT 10;
mapper.update: UPDATE k1_tb_warehouse_info SET warehouseName=#{warehouseName}, category1=#{category1}, category2=#{category2}, `area`=${area}, location=#{location}, outPlace=#{outPlace}, maxWeight=${maxWeight}, `status`=#{status}, updateDate=NOW() WHERE warehouseCode = CONCAT('warehouseCode_',#{warehouseCode}) AND mainBusinessCode = #{mainBusinessCode};
